page.title: 07Information Systems
page.content: {Library.}The library in Hunmanby opened in 1980 with two rooms. {Library Users.}The people who use the library are mostly old age pensioners.At night school children come and ask for books to use for homework.The library can also send away for books on request.This is free to children but costs 12p per book for adults or pensioners.The library is sometimes used as a meeting place for children. {Library Books.}The books are adult fiction and non fiction,junior fiction and non fiction and reference books.They have 3590 adult fiction, 4240 non fiction.There are 690 junior non fiction and 1060 fiction.There are also 220 reference. {Opening Hours.}It opens from 2:15p.m- 4:00p.m mon,wed,fri and sat morning. At nights from 5:45p.m_7:15p.m.
